name: Find Harvard ref
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com!

Edit the Expression   & Text to see matches Konverteringen kan även belysa brister och  (Thurén 2008, p.22). fördelar som en webbplats innehar (Saleh & Shukairy 2010, s. 10). . Roll over matches or the expression for (McCarthy and Hatcher, 1996: 69-70). details. Undo mistakes with cmd-z. Save & Share EU:s uppbyggnad kan beskrivas i form av tre "pelare" (Tallberg 2004). expressions with friends Tallberg (2004, 65) beskriver EU:s uppbyggnad i form av tre pelare.or the Community. A full Reference & Help (1996: 69-70)is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial (1999)p.57.

Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
author: gere
